name: Palmi: Retold Tale
description:
An evil sorcerer wants to take over the world. Only the good ghost Palmi and Flynn and Emma can stop him. Save the world with them by entering a series of incredible events. Fight with your wits to end the plans of the evil sorcerer. In this fairytale platform game about friendship and magic you will explore seven worlds with action full of beautiful music going through historical and fantasy locations. Discover the story that Palmi and his companions have to tell.

• Logic and skill-based puzzles
• Handcrafted worlds and characters
• Music that creates a background for the story
• A bit of surrealism
